column4: anyone, is there any way to make an ATAPI drive abort a read attempt? like if its stuck trying to read from a scratched disk?
allow ken to reboot the computer. Wasting time to wait for the process, is too much.
the process is sleeping, the DVD drive is what won't give up and go 'read error'
if his dvd is corrupted, or his drive is on the blink, like mine, then he will be waiting forever. reboot is faster.
